title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.12 - Inoperative vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.12 - Inoperative vehicles

State Regulations
(a) If a
vehicle becomes inoperative for any reason and it is parked in violation of
this Part, it is the responsibility of the owner/operator to make immediate
arrangements to remove it. Vehicle breakdowns may not be accepted as an excuse
for being illegally parked. (b) Storage of inoperative or damaged vehicles or those not displaying registration
plates in campus parking lots is prohibited, except as specifically permitted
by the chief of university police. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
562.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
